title: mzPeak metadata JSON parameter
description: Describe the JSON format of the metadata

name.description: The name of the parameter. If controlled, this should be the name from the source controlled vocabulary.

accession.description: The compact CURIE for the controlled vocabulary term, if it exists, null otherwise

value.description: The value for this parameter, if any. This may be omitted if null

unit.description: The compact CURIE for the unit describing the measurement for this parameter
